page.title: 15Page 15 Events-The Last Week
page.content: MONDAY- The staff took the Headmaster out for a drink to a local public house. He received a bouquet of rose- buds and a handmade photograph album. TUESDAY- The Annual Sports were held on the playing field at 2.00pm and the Chaplain's wife presented certificates to the successful pupils. In the evening 3 of the staff took the Head- master out to supper and he was presented with a travelling clock and card. WEDNESDAY- The whole school visited The Cotswold Wildlife Park near Burford and travelled there by coach. 4 members of staff,a parent and two of the Head's children accompanied the pupils. After- wards the Head met a Headteacher from the Didcot area to discuss his future. He'll work with a class and teacher for a term and then study the curriculum with staff for the rest of the year.
